prompt_inputs.goal: Marathon preparation with carbohydrate loading for high-endurance performance

solution_criteria: Meal plan covers all three meals plus snacks for one day
Total daily calories support high-endurance athlete needs (approximately 3000-3500 calories)
Carbohydrates comprise 60-70% of total calories for endurance fuel
Meals are practical and compact in description format
task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Testing with a high-endurance athlete (marathon runner) requiring maximum caloric intake and carbohydrate loading, with no dietary restrictions

prompt_inputs.goal: muscle building and strength recovery for weightlifting

task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Testing with a strength-focused athlete (weightlifter) requiring high protein content and muscle recovery nutrition, with a vegetarian dietary constraint

prompt_inputs.goal: High-performance fuel for competitive swimming with optimal recovery

solution_criteria: Meal plan covers all meals for one day (breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks)
Includes balanced macronutrients appropriate for an endurance athlete (adequate carbohydrates and protein)
All foods comply with stated allergies (no nuts or shellfish)
Plan is concise and practical for quick reference
task_description: Write a compact, concise 1 day meal plan for a single athlete
scenario: Testing with a sport-specific athlete (professional swimmer) requiring balanced macronutrients for energy and recovery, with an allergy constraint (nuts or shellfish)
